s.text: It didn't serve him so well this week, when his dire warnings that Y2K computer glitches would create a massive worldwide recession failed to come true.
In other words, fully 27 percent of the films Yardeni sees strike him as being either great or terrible.
It didn't serve him so well this week, when his dire warnings that Y2K computer glitches would create a massive worldwide recession failed to come true.

All but one of Yardeni's "great or terrible" ratings fall in the "great" category; the only movie Yardeni appears to have outright hated in recent years was Boogie Nights ,* a film that Chatterbox would assign at least one plus sign.
